title: Will Pax Sivir be available to buy again ?
body: Really like the skin, if only Riot could resell it

replies.body:
The best thing you can do is organize other players interested in acquiring PAX skins and create a convincing case for Riot to change their policy.

Halloween/Harrowing skins and other similar legacy ones used to be unavailable until Riot's marketing, eCommerce and skins teams were convinced to change their minds and policies.
These fall into a bit of a different category, as they were never available in the store.

This skin was given away to PAX attendees, it was never in the store for purchase. At this time, we don't have plans to bring back this, or other PAX skins. 

We've deactivated all old skin codes, which means that there is no way to obtain PAX Sivir, PAX Jax, Pax TF, etc. Any third party site claiming to have PAX Sivir, or any other super rare skin either has fake skin codes, or skins codes that no longer work. Please don't fall for it. ^-^
Oh. . . That's very heartbreaking to hear as a whole. D: </3 {{champion:37}}

So not trying to get on Riot's case or anything... but there is a point that honestly doesn't make sense to me.

Why not give out new code cards at future PAX events for all the old PAX skins? That way they could at least be available in SOME way (but still limited, if that's what Riot wants). KateyKhaos, (and I'm not trying to get anything binding from you/have you make a promise to us) but do you think the eCommerce team would ever consider doing that? And if not, would you be able to tell us the reasoning behind why they wouldn't?

It was never for sale - it was a promo for being at pax.  To my knowledge none of the pax skins will ever be available for sale - unless you buy them through 3rd party sites that have the codes.... which I believe is against the terms of service... but not sure.

I love the themes they have coming out now, but in all honesty, seeing some of the older stuff updated such as the Pax skins; it would be nice if a new line themed towards that were to be released. And in addition, maybe limited time availability to purchase the older ones as well. . . Sadly it doesn't seem like a realistic idea. Keep up the the spirit though. GL & HF on the RIft! {{champion:37}}
aww, It would be really rad to bring back all PAX for like a month though, what were these skins originally for? How were they obtained?

I was really hoping for a reply to this since PAX Sivir is suddenly getting a splash update; Way to rub it in our faces. 
{{champion:15}} {{item:3070}}
They are just unifying the splashes across all regions so they don't have different ones in different clients.  They already said in this thread that they have no plans on re-releasing them.
